chart_description: The `postgres.table_ops_rows_hot_ratio` chart measures the ratio of HOT updates for PostgreSQL tables. HOT updates (Heap-Only Tuples) occur when a row is updated in place without triggering an index update. This chart helps track whether the table is performing HOT updates efficiently.

dimension_descriptions.hot: This dimension measures the ratio of HOT updates. A higher ratio indicates efficient HOT updates as a larger portion of updates can be done without logging any physical changes to the table's indexes.
